text: Alejandro Ariel Vilca (born 5 July 1976) is an activist in the Socialist Workers' Party (Argentina).https://www.leftvoice.org/this-trash-worker-was- elected-to-provincial-congress-on-a-socialist-ticket Left Voice articlehttps://www.jacobinmag.com/2017/12/fit-argentina-pts-socialist-party- jujuy-alejandro-vilca Jacobin article He comes from an indigenous background, from the Qulla people, and worked as a garbage worker. In October 2017 he was elected as a provincial deputy in Jujuy Province, as part of the Workers' Left Front slate, which won 18% of the vote. == References == == External links == *TV interview (Spanish) *Jujuy candidates (Spanish) *La "moda trotska" se expande en Argentina *Vilca sobre la nueva legislatura Category:Socialist Workers' Party (Argentina) politicians Category:Indigenous people of South America Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:People from Jujuy Province
title: Alejandro Vilca
